transcript:
aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai.
Hello
Hello
haanji sir namaskar
hanji namaskar ji
ji sir main Punal chaudhary baat kar raha tha head office India mart se
ji ji ji namaskar ji sir aapka ek concern open hua tha aapne call kiya hoga main account manager baat kar raha hun aapka main
ji ji
ji aapne call kiya hoga i think customer care ko na
[unintelligible] sir
aap aapne call kiya hoga employee ko na
a call sir main India mart se baat kar raha hun haan haan kal kal kiya tha sir kal kiya tha theek hai theek hai
ji ji bataiye main aapka account manager baat kar raha hun mere paas hi aapka account aa gaya hai
okay okay okay ji ji ji ye main aapka jo account hai na aapka ye jo account hai main hi handle karunga isko matlab jo bhi koi dikkat hogi to aap bataiye aapne call kiya hoga kya kya issue aa raha tha
main keh raha tha sir apna issue ye tha ki jaise isme leads aur tender ka option aata hai matlab mera
hanji hanji
to main leads to chalo maine dekhi thi usme ek do tender the wo main dekh raha tha
achcha ji
han haan but usme fir wohi wo dikhate hain ki bhai aapke paas wo plan nahi hai koi bhi koi vaid plan nahi hai aapke paas
tender wala
han
nahi tender wala aise thodi hota hai tender wala to usme option aata hai usme kijiye usko consume karne ke usme bids vagera dalna padta hai pura fill up karna padta hai uska form vagera aapko
wo to main samajh gaya sir lekin keh raha ki bhai tender mein kya kitna valuation ka hai wo view bhi nahi ho raha
kya nahi ho raha ring matlab view usko view kar nahi pa raha main sir
achcha view nahi kar pa rahe aap
han to aap abhi free hain matlab main aapko na ek video meet ka link share kar deta hun us pe aap mujhe ek bari join karke dikhana fir main aapko pura acche se discuss kar rahe hain aapki welcome call hogi matlab aapko sab kuch discuss kar diya ki kaise kaise by leads vagera use karte hain sab kuch
nahi nahi wo abhi to ye classes aap bata rahe ho ye abhi hui nahi hai ji meri
achcha hui nahi hai abhi tak to ek kaam karna aap abhi kab free hain aap mujhe ye bataiye time agar abhi bhi free hain to main aapko sir abhi abhi factory mein jane laga tha meri mein
achcha han haan abhi to gadi mein hun achcha aaj main laptop nahi leke aaya sir phone mein agar ho to batao ha phone ha phone se hi karna hai koi dikkat nahi hai phone se theek hai ji aap aap ek kaam karna 11 baje kar lo sir 11 baje
han main aapko na 11 baje call kar lunga but aap ek kaam karna 11 baje jaise main aapko call karunga to aap mujhe na agar kuch product vagera isme kuch product vagera agar kuch karana hai wo bata dena aur dusra kya hai jo aap ek concern open hua tha
hm ye ticket ke regarding to iska na main abhi isko close kara do fir main aapka ye main aapko na pura discuss kar dunga video on video meet hi aap samajh paoge
kyunki aise main aap samajh paoge na tender vagera kaise close karna hai totally jo pura satisfaction hota hai uska main aapko bata dunga kya kya hota hai
theek hai theek hai kya kar do sir isko haan main isko kar deta hun aur sir jaise abhi tak aapne koi by list vagera use kari hai isme matlab abhi tak koi bataya hoga ki bhai kaise by list vagera use hoti hai
nahi wo to sir koi kal aaj bhi i think ki aapne subah bilaspur ki haan haan haan haan haan
kal wohi to mere paas thi gurmeet rathi hm hm hm wo to sir bahut thodi quantity thi uska to fir main yahan se supply nahi kar sakta jalandar wali ek jalandar ek ek ek jalandar wali ki thi aapne na
han jalandar ki to kal raat ki thi
han ye jo jalandar wali thi wo kal raat ki thi hm ek kari thi aapki diru dirugadh ki nahi do hi thi export wo bhi kal ki thi matlab aapne dekha hoga by list pe agar aap jaoge to us contact pe now pe agar click karte ho tab hota hai wo
han wo pata hai sir wo to main samajh hi gaya uska ji ji to isko na main pura na ek bari agar isme product vagera agar add karani hai wo bata dena sari cheez isme discuss kar denge aapka
theek hai ji theek hai sir aur jab bhi agar agar call karoge to direct mera number save kar lena to jab bhi agar koi dikkat mujhe hi call karna isi number pe
theek hai theek hai product vagera karna hai isme kuch add aur matlab aapke jaise totally nahi abhi nahi abhi nahi karna ji koi bhi
achcha hm total 25 product hai na aapke nut bolt wale jo hai ji ji ji ji ji ji to main wohi puch raha tha ki agar aap agar isme product vagera isme agar karne hai add to photo vagera agar mujhe bhej dete kyuki pura na description vagera sari cheeze video meet pe na pura ek bari samajh lenge aapko bata denge pura process kya hota hai
theek hai ji ji ji ji
theek hai sir 11 baje bata dena fir aap to main 11 baje karta hun aapko call na fir video meet pe join kar lete hain theek hai sir okay ji okay okay okay sir okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to view tender valuation.

- Wants to know how to use buyleads.


Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet to resolve issue.

- Executive will call at 11 AM.

- Executive will close the ticket.


Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, tender, video meet, products
